reviews.title: Still more effort required

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are spacious. Too many buttons serve little to make a dimm room any brighter. Tv channels did not work. None worked. Two people tried to help. Wifi worked for few minutes and was non existent. No one could help with that. Rain shower slow and ineffective. For some reason my room was near somewhere in the hotel where there was lots of movement and moving of goods even after midnight. I heard it was renovated recently. But floors were slightly damaged and some signs of dampness too. I left my evaluation with then to action.
reviews.title: Excellent property and courteous staff...

reviews.text: Food was okay. Priced bit high for okay food wen compared to 5 star hotels nearby. Breakfast was good and wide variety. Transport is not in house so plan ahead and over half day in advance.
reviews.title: Mishti Doi amongst excellent Hotels!

reviews.text: They could be a top hotel if they can achieve consistency. At least start with the wifi staff ability to sort out issues. My colleagues tv channels also did not work. Anyways, I will stay there next year and hope I am experience the great reviews others report on.
reviews.title: DISAPPOINTING ROOM BUT GOOD RESTAURANT

reviews.text: We stayed there for two nights from 10th to 12th sep 12. This was my first trip to Kalkota, and i feel this comfortable place had a lot to do in making this trip wonderful. Front desk was prompt to check us in early without any hassle, upgraded us, n saw to it that we were in our room at the earliest. We had opted for the summer package, ie breakfast and dinner, Food was excellent and buffet spread was reasonably OK, but could do better. F&B Mgr Mr. Chaterjee, was always there to look after guests needs. One drawback was the spa...space was really constrained there...Overall an awesome experience.
reviews.title: A great option for business travellers !

reviews.text: This is probably the best place to stay in terms of the location. The hotel is on The Park Street and hence you can walk to your favorite restaurants on the street. It is centrally located and hence everything is within 30 Minutes by cab.

A good business and family hotel
reviews.text: Close to the city centre with easy checkin and lovely food comes complimentary with spacious room and right price. Only thing if need to be aware about fluctuating one way traffic rules while approaching hotel as even for 50 meters, we may need a turn of a kilometer.

This was a very good hotel. We went in the month of may. The food was very good. The location of the hotel is also very near to the shopping crazy family of mine. It has all the amenities we wanted. The room was spacious and clean. The room service was very Prompt ( Something which is a problem in many Hotels). There was no Foul smell in the room. We really Liked it.
reviews.title: Very Good Hotel

reviews.text: As somebody once said, location, location location. The hotel is located at the heart of Kolkata , a walking distance from many of the tourist areas and the main dining area of the city.
reviews.title: Ideal location, the service was first class

reviews.text: It is a standard hotel with all the conveniences you might expect. However what stands out is the service quality which was really first class. Right from the reception desk, the bell boy , to everybody you met in the corridors, the service stood out.
reviews.title: Great hotel in a great location !

reviews.text: The breakfast was adequate. If I have to criticise, I must say that the serivce in the restaurant for a dinner that we had was not really as good as the rest of the service. However during breakfast time, the service was again excellent.
reviews.title: 10/10 marks to the staff

reviews.text: This is the first instant review I have submitted, while staying at this hotel. Quite frankly, due to my earlier nightmare at Hotel Trimoorti a couple of years back, I had given up the idea of an overnight stay in Kolkata.
reviews.title: Too Good!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If Kingfisher Airline did not meet it fate, I would have always taken late evening flight out after a full days of meetings, but now I have to stay overnight when I have more than 4 meetings in a day as no late eevening flights available from Kolkata to Mumbai.
reviews.title: Excellent value

reviews.text: Check-in was smooth and prompt, entered the room. It was on 2nd floor but did not mind as I was to only spend the night. Room was huge by any standards, almost as spacious as an Executive Room in a regular 5*. Bathroom too comes with a bath tub (simply to add a frill though) but ambience was nothing less than a 5*.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in the heart of Kolkata!

reviews.text: Only if one wants to be a critic, it is not too difficult to identify a few lapses in finish - a hole in bathroom ceilingpossibly for a lamp left open, WC toilet seat not clean from top (not visible if WC is kept open) and wash-basin counter not cleaned thoroughly. But as I wrote earlier, this should not affect the overall rating for this hotel.
